                                co.cask.http.HttpResponder responder)
                        throws Exception

        Throws:

      • getNodeProperties

        @POST
@Path(value="/getNodeProperties")
public void getNodeProperties(org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request,
                               co.cask.http.HttpResponder responder)
                       throws Exception
        Get properties of nodes from a specific cluster visible to the user. POST body is a JSON object that must contain "clusterId", and may contain "properties" and "services". The "properties" key maps to an array of node properties like "ipaddress" and "hostname" to return in the response. The "services" key maps to an array of service names, indicating that all nodes returned by have all services given in the array. The response is a JSON object with node ids as keys and JSON objects as values, where the value contains the properties passed in, or all properties if none were passed in.
        Parameters:
        request - Request for node properties in a cluster.
        responder - Responder for sending the response.
        Throws:
        Exception
